document.title: Community Digest: Summer Edition
document.summary: In this post, you will learn how to deploy a blog using Simple custom asset source plugin that uses the webcam to insert a photo in the image field.
document.author: Lisa Allison

document.title: Why we think Simple is good for developers
document.summary: In this post, you will learn how to deploy a blog using Simple custom asset source plugin that uses the webcam to insert a photo in the image field.
document.author: Micheal Osman
